mutants.code:
def sum_of_lengths_of_distinct_subarrays(arr, n):
    store = set()
    count = 1
    i = 0
    for item in arr:
        while i < n and arr[i] not in store:
            store.add(arr[i])
            i += 1
        count += len(store) * (len(store) + 1) // 2
        store.remove(item)
    return count
